data.eml:eml: The genus Macronemus Dejean, 1835 (Insecta: Coleoptera: Cerambycidae: Lamiinae): two new species, new records and a new synonymy

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Machado, Vanessa S., Monné, Marcela L. (2013): The genus Macronemus Dejean, 1835 (Insecta: Coleoptera: Cerambycidae: Lamiinae): two new species, new records and a new synonymy. Zootaxa 3693 (2): 163-181, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3693.2.3
